name: Paraneoplastic Polyneuropathy
chief_complaint: I've been feeling weak in my arms and legs, and I keep stumbling when I walk.
prognosis: Variable; depends on early detection and treatment of underlying cancer. Neurological symptoms may improve with tumor treatment but often have residual deficits.
description: A rare immune-mediated neurological disorder associated with occult malignancies, particularly small cell lung cancer. Antibodies against neuronal antigens cross-react with peripheral nerves, causing progressive sensorimotor neuropathy.
